statement: People growing older with a learning disability are actively involved when their care and support needs are being assessed.
People growing older with a learning disability have a named lead practitioner.
People growing older with a learning disability are involved in developing a plan for the future and reviewing it at least annually.
People growing older with a learning disability have an annual health check, which is used to update their health action plan.
People growing older with a learning disability meet hospital staff before any planned hospital admission to agree arrangements that make the stay easier for them.
